tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GeneticMutations (
    mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
    population_id INT,
    observation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  population_id UUID REFERENCES populations(id),
  occurrence_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE populations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  population_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  country VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  total_individuals INT NOT NULL,
  tracking_start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE mutations (
  mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  mutation_name VARCHAR(255),
  population_id INT,
  is_detected BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE populations (
  population_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  population_name VARCHAR(255),
  country_code VARCHAR(3),
  total_individuals INT
)

CREATE TABLE diseases (
  disease_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  disease_name VARCHAR(255),
  mutation_id INT,
  population_id INT
)
